short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keyword Surfer allows you to generate keyword ideas and see search volumes directly in Google search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keyword Surfer generates fresh keyword ideas and search volumes, right from your Google search results.

Each time you search in Google, you'll uncover valuable insights on search volume, CPC, keyword suggestions, related terms, visibility metrics, and on-page data.

Download the extension and add it to any Chromium-based search engine. Once added, make sure to grant the extension any required access and you’re good to go. Then, start by Googling a term—Keyword Surfer will appear on the side panel of your Google results page, however, you may be required to scroll down the page to see it.

With Keyword Surfer, you can also store keywords for quick access, without having to google them separately every time. Plus, you can conveniently export collections as a .csv file whenever you need to.

Streamline your whole content creation research process without ever leaving Google results page.
 
NEW! Keyword Surfer can now be used in ChatGPT to humanize the written content. It also shows you how likely your content is to be detected as human-like. Check more in our [Keyword Surfer in ChatGPT article](https://docs.surferseo.com/en/articles/9956100-keyword-surfer-in-chatgpt).

Looking for our Google Docs extension for effortless writing with SEO optimization in mind? [You can find it here!](https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/surfer-for-google-docs/faapilcgnafanfcdhlkjijhoimmlhmjn)
 
______________________________
